tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE health_records (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  encrypted_record TEXT,
  blockchain_access_hash VARCHAR(100),
  access_type ENUM('patient', 'provider'),
  access_key VARCHAR(50),
  encryption_key VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE HealthRecords (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    health_data JSONB,
    encrypted_symmetric_key BYTEA,
    encrypted_access_grants JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE health_records (
	health_record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id INT,
	doctor_id INT,
	health_record_data TEXT,
	encryption_key VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	health_record_id INT,
	accessed_by_id INT,
	access_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_records (
	block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	health_record_id INT,
	previous_block_id INT,
	block_data TEXT,
	block_hash VARCHAR(64)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
	patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_name VARCHAR(50),
	patient_address TEXT,
	patient_birthdate DATE,
	patient_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE doctors (
	doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
	doctor_specialty VARCHAR(50),
	doctor_license_number VARCHAR(20),
	hospital_id INT
);
